description: Global View Dashboard for Kubernetes cluster(s)

panels.description:
Guaranteed: All containers have matching CPU and memory requests and limits, granting the highest protection from eviction.

Burstable:
At least one container has resource requests, but requests and limits don’t match exactly, resulting in medium eviction priority.

BestEffort:
No CPU or memory requests/limits, making these pods first in line for eviction under resource pressure.
panels.title: Pods QoS classes

panels.description: No data is generally a good thing here.
panels.title: Container Restarts by Namespace

panels.description: No data is generally a good thing here.
panels.title: Pod OOM Events by Namespace

panels.description: Dropped noisy virtual devices for readability.
panels.title: Global Network Utilization by Device

panels.description: Dropped noisy virtual devices for readability.
panels.title: Network Received by Node

targets.expr:
- (sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{}[$__rate_interval])) by (namespace)
+ on (namespace)
(sum(rate(windows_container_network_transmit_bytes_total{container_id!=""}[$__rate_interval]) * on (container_id) group_left (container, pod, namespace) max by ( container, container_id, pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_info{container_id!=""}) OR kube_namespace_created{} * 0) by (namespace)))

title: Kubernetes Cluster View
